ygData.subject: Re: Songs descriptions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Back when I first tried this song in beta, it used to require brass.  The other night, though, I tried it without an instrument, and it worked!  I want to
ygData.messageBody:
> 18 Denon's disruptive discord.
>
> Uses BRASS, so I never used the song... until a few days ago. GREAT
> SONG Lowers target AC, and damages them about one and a half times as much
> as the level two song does. Use it and get yer brass skill up there....
> you'll want it for the level 26 song. Area effect
>

Back when I first tried this song in beta, it used to require brass. The other
night, though, I tried it without an instrument, and it worked! I want to test
it out to see what the difference is between instrument and no instrument and
compare it to Chords. I'll try to do that tonight.

One other thing I noticed, it seems to have a smaller area of effect than Chords
of Dissonance, which is a GOOD thing. It reaches far enough to make the things
swarming you wince, but not far enough to pull the whole zone down atop you.

Thanks for posting the song descriptions, it's a good list.

Jyzan
